input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item title:
GiftBay Wedding Metal Charger Plates 13" Round with Beautiful Fleur-de-lis Embossed on Border, Burgundy Finish, Set of 4 Plates, Made of Heavy Metal Sheet and Powder Coated

Item specifications:
Awesome metal charger plates with embossed Fleur-de-lis design, comes in a set of 4, burgundy finish
Excellent value, why buy cheap plastic made, when available direct from factory at an excellent price
Measures 13" diameter and fits in regular dinner plates
Cannot be used as dinner plates themselves
Additional quantity is available if needed for immediate shipment until is sold out
Powder Coated finish to last for long time for professional wedding and special events planners
Charger Plates also available in different designs and colors

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Hello, thank you for your interest in our Fredrick Ramond FR88500GL Egg Glass Replacement Glass. This item is a glass replacement, and it comes in a traditional style. The UPC for this item is 640665905502.

We are a leading manufacturer and supplier of replacement glass for a variety of bathroom and kitchen fixtures, and we bring you the best quality at the best prices. Our glass is designed to fit a variety of fixtures, and we offer a range of finishes to suit any style.

If you have any questions or concerns about this product, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to help.
input_text.Response B:
GiftBay Wedding Metal Charger Plates 13" Round with Beautiful Fleur-de-lis Embossed on Border, Burgundy Finish, Set of 4 Plates, Made of Heavy Metal Sheet and Powder Coated:

The GiftBay Wedding Metal Charger Plates 13" Round with Beautiful Fleur-de-lis Embossed on Border, Burgundy Finish, Set of 4 Plates, Made of Heavy Metal Sheet and Powder Coated is an excellent value, why buy cheap plastic made, when available direct from the factory at an excellent price.

These charger plates are made of heavy metal sheet and powder-coated to last for long time for professional wedding and special events planners.  The charger plates cannot be used as dinner plates themselves.  They measure 13" in diameter and fit in regular dinner plates.  Charger Plates also available in different designs and colors. Additional quantity is available if needed for immediate shipment until is sold out.

Note:  You will receive 4 charger plates inburgundy finish.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: I think Response A might have gotten some wires crossed. The requester is asking about a charging plate and the ChatBot seems to think they're talking about glass replacements. It also does not include the specifications that the user requested. It also does not specify that this is not a dinner plate.
label_annotations.factors_b: Response B was spot on. It included all the relevant information. The formatting was great and easy to read. This description made it well known that this product is a charging plate, not a dinner plate. It was accurate and thorough.
